content: I don’t see this as hard at all. With Clinton, there was no chance of rolling back abortion or GLBTQ rights. Trump only cares about being in power and will gladly throw abortion and gay rights backers under the bus. He doesn’t care if abortion is banned. Rich people have always known perfectly well where to go to get hookers, porn, alcohol (during Prohibition) and abortions for their mistresses (those they cared about, as opposed to the ones they just kicked to the curb).
